synopsis.text:
Amuro Tooru, a man of mystery, leads a triple life as a Public Security Bureau agent, a renowned detective, and a member of the clandestine Black Organization. Known by many names - Rei Furuya, Toru Amuro, and Bourbon - he skillfully navigates the delicate balance between light and shadow. As a strict superior, an eager apprentice, and a manipulative informant, who is the real man behind these masks?

Delve into the everyday life of this enigmatic figure as he maintains his various roles while working at Caf√© Poirot and collaborating with the police force. From thrilling high-speed chases to heartwarming moments with a stray dog, Amuro's life is a complex tapestry of experiences that reveal glimpses of the man beneath the disguises.

Join Amuro Tooru in this Detective Conan spin-off, as he masterfully juggles his triple identities while uncovering the truth and seeking answers to his own mysterious past. Will the elusive 'Zero' ever reveal his true self when no one is watching? Only time will tell.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
